name: ICEPURE Under Sink Water Filter System, 3 Years or 22000 Gallons Ultra High Life NSF/ANSI 42 Certified, Removes Heavy Metals,Chlorine,Direct Connect Under Counter Drinking Water System, USA Tech
short_description: Easy Installation - Easy to install with clear instructions and video. ICEPURE Under Sink Water Filter with super simple plug-and-play install design. Authoritative Certifications - ICEPURE Under Sink Water Filter System bears major Authoritative Certifications on markets, such as NSF/ANSI 42 & 372. NSF/ANSI 42 tested reduces Chlorine, Taste, and Odor. 22000 Gallons filter capacity. Significantly improving the taste of drinking water to provide pure-tasting water, while retaining minerals beneficial to the human body. NSF/ANSI 372 Certification for Lead-Free.

Long Service Life - Tested by NSF/ANSI 42 for large filtration capacity of 22000 Gallons when used municipal water. 3x longer life than other filters, the cheaper most bang for the buck. Recommend replacing the filter every 22000 gallons for 3 Years for better filtration. ICEPURE filters use advanced and precise measurement technology, combined with 3D multi-dimensional design technology to ensure that fully match and do not leak water.

Premium Materials - BPA-free and Food-grade materials. This filter is made from advanced coconut shell carbon and is Certified by Authoritative Organizations for Materials. The Outer layer is 0.5 Micron, ensuring better filtration. The carbon blocks have been independently tested for heavy metals, large sediments, and all other impurities. With such a high level of filtration, you can be confident that you are drinking clean and clear water.

Fit 1/2" 3/8" Cold Water Line - Only for cold water line. Directly connect to the original faucet without a countertop hole. Suitable for faucets with 1/2" or 3/8" FEMALENPT thread. name: VIOMI® PFAS Reduction Reverse Osmosis System, NSF/ANSI 372&53&42 Certified, 9 Stage & 48 Months Filter, Tankless RO Water Filtration System Under Sink, 800G, Smart LED Reminder, Incl. 1 Extra Filter
short_description: [NSF/ANSI 372&53&42 Standard Certified] This Viomi 800G RO system is certified to strict water purification standards. Independent tests ensure the health and safety of your drinking water, giving you complete peace of mind.

[Tankless & Compact Design] Viomi RO water filter saves 65% of under-sink space. You can quickly install your water purifier within 20 minutes with the help of our 4-step easy installation guide. (Note: Requires an electrical outlet and drilling two holes: 1"-1.5" for the faucet and 1/4" for wastewater. Product Size: 16.3"D x 5.04"W x 12.75"H)

[Reduce TDS & PFOA/PFOS] Our 9-stage reverse osmosis system effectively reduces a wide range of contaminants, including TDS, PFOA, PFOS, chlorine, lead, and microplastics. With a 0.0001μm filtration precision, you can trust every drop. Enjoy exceptional purity with a TDS reduction of up to 90.35% and PFOS/PFOA reduction of up to 99.60%. (Tested by SGS).

[4 Years Long-Lasting Filter & Easy Replacement] Our Viomi 800G RO system includes two pre-installed filters (1 RO + 1 PCB) and an additional PCB filter, giving you a total filter lifespan of up to 4 years. You don't have to remember replacement schedules—the LED faucet glows orange when it's time. Replacing a filter is quick, easy, and requires no tools.

[3:1 Pure-to-Drain Ratio] The V8 RO system boasts an impressive 75% purification rate, far better than the average 50%. Its efficient 3:1 pure-to-drain ratio means you get 3 cups of pure water for every 1 cup of wastewater. This not only saves you money but also reduces water waste for a more eco-friendly home.

[High-Capacity 800 GPD Fast Flow] Get water on demand. Our system fills a 7oz cup in just 6 seconds, so you can drink instantly without waiting. The large water flow also makes it convenient for washing fruits and vegetables. Please note: This water filter is not compatible with refrigerators or ice makers.

TDS is not a professional way to measure the water quality. Essential Minerals, Calcium, Potassium, Sodium, Magnesium...These essential minerals are dissolved solids, PPM will not be dropping if you test with a TDS meter. name: GLACIER FRESH 2.25G Stainless Steel Countertop Water Filtration System, Gravity-Fed with Elarisey™ Filtration Technology, Reduces Heavy Metals, PFOA & PFOS, and Meets SGS Standards
short_description: Our countertop water filtration system uses Elarisey electrosorption technology, which activates a strong positive charge within the mineral’s natural crystal structure when exposed to water (pH 5–9). This attracts negatively charged submicron contaminants, capturing tiny particles, pathogens, and reducing heavy metals and impurities more effectively than conventional filters. Perfect for customers seeking a high-performance gravity-fed water purifier.

The GLACIER FRESH stainless steel gravity water filter features a uniquely engineered water inlet system that minimizes leftover water. This ensures nearly zero drinking water residue, prevents stale water buildup, and improves hygiene and efficiency—ideal for households looking for a high-use countertop water filter system.

Each long-lasting filter cartridge delivers up to 200 gallons of clean, great-tasting drinking water (performance may vary with water quality). For the best results, replace the cartridge every 3 months. A perfect choice for families wanting a reliable, cost-effective water filtration system with easy maintenance.

This gravity-fed countertop water filter system installs in minutes—no plumbing skills or tools needed. Completely non-electric, it provides safe drinking water anytime, even during emergencies such as power outages, snowstorms, or floods. Simply assemble, fill, and enjoy clean, purified water. Flush with 2 gallons before first use.

Built for families, this 2.25-gallon stainless steel water filtration system provides ample purified water for up to 4 people, making it perfect for home kitchens, apartments, RVs, camping, and emergency preparedness. A dependable high-capacity gravity water filter for daily use or outdoor adventures.

name: 3M Aqua-Pure Whole House Sanitary Quick Change Water Filter System AP904, Reduces Sediment, Chlorine Taste and Odor, and Scale, Heavy Duty, 100,000 Gallon
short_description: CLEARLY GREAT WATER: This Whole House Water Filter Reduces Sediment Build-Up, Chlorine Taste And Odor As Well As Scale – Helping To Increase The Life Of Hot Water Heaters And Appliances (Dishwashers, Clothes Washers, Etc).

EASY REPLACEMENT: Revolutionize your water filtration with water filters whole house design, featuring a Sanitary Quick Change (SQC) system with filter life as high as up to 1 year. This water filter whole house system simplifies the replacement process, eliminating the need for a filter wrench or touching the filter media.

HIGH CAPACITY: Marvel at the high capacity of this sediment filter, boasting a 100,000 gallon capacity. This house water filter system is equipped with an activated carbon filter, ensuring high flow rates and compatibility with both chlorinated and non-chlorinated water systems.

EFFORTLESS INSTALLATION: Installation of this whole house water filtration system is straightforward, thanks to the 1” inlet and outlet connections. These water filters whole house system are designed to meet the water pressure demands of most homes and flowrates upto 20 gpm, ensuring a smooth and efficient operation.

DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Have confidence in the durability of this water filter whole house system, constructed with a 304 stainless steel head. This filter Incorporates activated carbon block with a non-woven pleat media filtration, promising a long service life and is tested by NSF Standard 42 and 372 Certified, ensuring it meets high standards for food, water, consumer product and environment protection.
NSF STANDARD 42 CERTIFIED: Tested by one of the world’s most respected independent certification organizations that helps protect the world’s food, water, consumer product and environment
IDEAL FOR larger homes and is effective with both chlorinated (municipal) and non-chlorinated (well water) systems
product_description: Whole house water filter systems are great solutions to help protect your pipes and appliances as well as offer you great tasting drinking water from anywhere in the home. The 3M Aqua-Pure AP900 Series Whole House Sanitary Quick Change Water Filter Systems are the industry's first Sanitary Quick Change (SQC) whole house system. The AP904 contains filter media that help reduce sediment, chlorine taste and odor, and scale. The AP904 improves water quality and taste while supply cleaner, clearer water to every water source point in the house. These systems are referred to as point-of-entry (POE) systems and are installed downstream from the water meter or well pump. These systems help protect plumbing and fixtures while reducing unpleasant taste and odor. Maintenance of a whole-house water filter system is as simple as replacing a light bulb with a simple quarter turn of the 3M Aqua-Pure AP917HD-S Replacement Water Filter Cartridge or placing a service call with your local plumbing professional (please refer to your installation manual or replacement instruction card). The scale inhibition feature uses polyphosphates in minute quantities to bind calcium and magnesium hardness minerals, preventing them from precipitating out and building up on metallic surfaces which can reduce flow rates throughout the home’s plumbing system. 1" stainless steel inlet and outlet connections provide easy installation for a plumbing professional and peak flow rates up to 20 gpm to meet the needs of residential applications. The innovative Sanitary Quick Change (SQC) design, an industry first for this application, allows for fast and easy cartridge change-outs without having to contact the filter media or the need for a filter wrench. The AP904 is manufactured with a head assembly that includes an integral mounting bracket. The 304 stainless steel head can be installed on existing copper pipes in the home. It consists of a corrosion resistant material that provides long service life. Tested and verified by manufacturer's laboratory. Replace every 12 months, at 100,000 gallons of use, or sooner if a noticeable reduction in flow occurs.
product_details: Product Benefits ‎Inhibits Lime-Scale Growth, Extends Life of Appliances

name: Aquaboon 3-Stage Whole House Water Filter System with 5 Micron 10x4.5 House Water Purification Pleated Sediment, Carbon Chlorine Reduction and Reducing Sediment Filter, Pressure Gauge, Wrench, Bracket
short_description: Triple Power: 3-stage whole house water filtration system with carbon block, sediment, and polyphosphate filters prevents scale, removes rust, silt, dirt, and protects plumbing.

First Stage - Non-Woven Polyester Durability: Constructed from high-quality non-woven polyester, pleated water filter is built to last. Its robust material resists chemicals and wear, ensuring reliable performance in your house water filter system over the long term.

Second Stage - Sediment Protection: The initial filtration stage tackles dust, sand, rust, and silt, preventing these particles from reaching downstream house water filters. This sediment buster filter helps protect your plumbing and appliances from potential harm.

Third Stage - Powerful Carbon Filtration: In the final stage, our activated carbon filter within 3 stage whole house water filter system eliminates up to 99% of chlorine, along with unpleasant tastes, odors, and chemicals. Enjoy pure, refreshing water from every tap.

Water for Every Use: Enjoy the difference in flavor with filtered water without unpleasant odors and tastes. Whether for cooking, drinking, or making coffee, full house water filtration system ensures your water always tastes fresh.

Efficient Water Flow for Large Households: Designed to support high water demands, this 3-stage whole house water filter system maintains a strong, consistent water flow of up to 15 GPM, ensuring clean filtered water for all your daily needs.

Easy Installation & Minimal Maintenance: Setting up the Aquaboon whole house water filtration system is straightforward with our included wrench, bracket, and instructions. Pressure gauges and release buttons simplify monitoring and filter replacements.

Durable, Leak-Free Design: Built with a double O-ring seal, house water filter system ensures a watertight connection. The FDA-grade polypropylene construction meets stringent safety standards, providing you with a reliable home water filtration solution.

Comprehensive Water Treatment for Every Need: This full house water filtration system is designed to meet all your household water requirements, providing pure, filtered water not only for drinking but also for cooking, bathing, and cleaning.
